description: King Benjamin was the son of Mosiah I, a righteous king, and a seer who ruled over the land of Zarahemla. His people included those of different cultural backgrounds: the original inhabitants of Zarahemla and Nephites who had migrated to that region under the leadership of his father. In his earlier years, he had personally fought in defense of his people against the Lamanites and was successful in driving them out of the land.
